messages.subject: Re: Project CaterPillar Brainstorming
messages.bodyText: Hello Philip, As far as the business meetings, I think it would be more productive to try and stimulate discussions across the different groups about what is working and what is not. Best, John

messages.subject: Project CaterPillar Brainstorming
messages.bodyText: John, I wanted to discuss the progress of the CaterPillar project. Could we set up a meeting to go over some ideas? Regards, Philip

discord.author: phillip.allen@enron.com
discord.content: I have something like this, please let me know what changes you'd like for me to make! I can also do all of the other scenarios by the end of the day so you have all the necessary slides.

cards.description: The prompt template classes in LangChain are built to make constructing prompts with dynamic inputs easier.

comments.commentName: Will be implemented without ML Flow integration.

checkItems.checkitemName: Langchain prompt template for PII data protector
